channel.title: Woh im on a roll with ideas today anyways a new catagory?
channel.description: can you make a flash section catagory thing please? because i have made quite alot of flash tutorials and games and i wanted to post here in a flash section

item.title: Woh im on a roll with ideas today anyways a new catagory?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Flash could be graphics, web design or general programming, depending on what you are doing. You can post in any of those boards.

Read full topic

item.description:

Winter Ice:

yes but flash is also programing (actionscript) and you can also make other things with it like forms ect…

Put it in general programming.
